name: Space:MechDefender
description:
A revolutionary cartoon defense game packed with action and strategy.
In this game, you need to form a team from 12 very different heroes to defend the planet from total destruction. Choose the way to counter different kinds of enemies and build up your own strategy before a battle, and then choose which target to suffer from your mighty firepower during it. In this revolutionary game, targeting is as important as the strategical choice before battle.
Earn money from stages or unlimited waves of enemies, upgrade your hero, choose the best talent makes you the protector of the universe.
Experience the intense battle including super huge boss fight, unlimited wave of monsters.

Features
-Story and challenge mode already in the game.
-New Modes, Heroes and Monsters coming soon
-40 different stages, 4 challenge maps
-12 different heroes
-Fight from the home planet to the ultimate universe.
